item.description:
Get back into the swing of writing in the new year. Bring a work in progress and spend an hour or two writing with other writers.

Take the opportunity to discuss new ideas, encourage each other to meet self set goals, share websites and resources... Or just focus on your writing and see how much you can get done with a little dedicated time.

BackBay Borders on 511 Boylston St., Boston
http://www.borders.co...
The cafe is upstairs, we will try to confiscate a table to sit around. I'm Jess. (423 863 4344) There are power outlets and free internet. Send me a message if you have any questions.

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Weekly Writing Returns
